titles.title: Independent Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2014
To reauthorize chapter 40 of title 28, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 5/7/2014--Introduced. Independent Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2014 - Amends the federal judicial code to reauthorize the independent counsel law (currently, the law is expired) for a five-year period.
